title: Son of a Boy Dad: Ep. 20 - We Are
description:
-- Sas & Rone discuss their weekend trip to Happy Valley, Philly, & Rone's Dad's house, as well as stories from college, anti-iPad summer camp, & much more -- Thanks for listening, buy some merch!


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/sonofaboydad
